tr.td: Brain regions from resting-state functional connectivity analysis *
~3 cm anterior and inferior to T4
~0.5 cm inferior to the midpoint Fp2–Fp1
~1 cm anterior and inferior to F3
R Superior frontal gyrus/Supplementary motor area
~2 cm anterior and inferior to C4
~1 cm posterior and superior to Fp2
Overlapping brain regions from functional and anatomical connectivity analysis †
~1 cm posterior and inferior to P3

fn.p: * The threshold for positive rsFC is T > 8, and for negative rsFC is T < −4. † The threshold for positive rsFC is T > 4.5, and for negative rsFC is T < −3. Abbreviations: L: Left, R: Right; Bil: Bilateral.
